name: NBA General Manager 2018
description:
Are you a fan of the basketball game? It’s time to drive your favorite team during the Season. Manage your franchise, lead and coach a professional basketball team. Build the best 5-men unit lineups ever!

Sign guards, centers and forwards, get the best basketball players and lead them to dribble and dunk until victory!
Compete in THREE MATCH MODES: Head-to-head games, tournaments, or league. Get equipped for your Season team, hire the best trainers and defeat all the basketball teams of every division in order to win in this sports game. Offense throws win games, but backcourt defense wins basketball tournaments. Plan your tactical shots and throws strategy in all our tournaments!

The value of your player is the core of this ball sports game! Every basketball player has his own offensive and defensive skills. Challenge your friends in Basketball Manager 2019. In this strategic sports game, you will have to work the tactics to build the best basketball team ever by trading and training basket players, win big games and beat every opponent. Enjoy to the new Season and select lineups from your roster simulations! Steal the ball from a free throw, dribble, throw shots, rebound and dunk before the basket quarters timeout!

Features of Basketball Manager 2019:
-> Sign and trade players in auction
-> Coach rookies and lineup a team!
-> Various options to compete: Head-to-head games, tournaments or the league
-> The higher the players' level, the better they will score in a match!
-> Compete and play with your friends

The basketball Season court requires you! Grab the ball, plan your throws and shots tactics as well as lineups and roster! Start your career now and become the most wanted basketball coach manager! Be the winner in every league match!
